mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(USER_ID_NO, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_COUNT, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS) VALUES (#{userIdNo}, #{productId}, #{productCount}, #{productPrice}, #{productDiscount}, #{productSaleStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId};
mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_ID, c.USER_ID_NO, c.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, c.PRODUCT_COUNT, c.PRODUCT_PRICE, c.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, c.PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS, i1.IMAGE_URL, i1.IMAGE_ID FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE c.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
